# Alexandra Johnson

alex.johnson@email.com | +1-555-0200 | linkedin.com/in/alexjohnson | github.com/alexjohnson | San Francisco, CA

## Summary

Seasoned software architect with 15+ years of experience in building scalable distributed systems. Passionate about developer experience, performance optimization, and mentoring engineering teams.

## Experience

**VP of Engineering** | TechGiant Inc | Jan 2023–Present

- Oversee 60+ engineers across 8 teams building cloud infrastructure
- Drove adoption of platform engineering practices, reducing deployment time by 70%
- Established engineering career ladder and mentorship program
- Led migration from monolith to microservices architecture

**Principal Software Engineer** | CloudScale Systems | Mar 2019–Dec 2022

- Architected a multi-region data pipeline processing 5TB/day
- Designed fault-tolerant messaging system with 99.99% uptime
- Led technical strategy for the infrastructure platform team
- Published 3 internal technical papers on distributed consensus

**Senior Software Engineer** | DataFlow Inc | Jun 2016–Feb 2019

- Built real-time analytics engine handling 1M events/second
- Implemented custom query optimizer reducing p99 latency by 60%
- Led migration from on-premise to AWS, saving $2M/year in infrastructure costs
- Mentored 8 engineers from junior to mid-level

**Software Engineer** | WebDev Studios | Jan 2013–May 2016

- Developed customer-facing web applications serving 5M+ users
- Built internal tooling that improved developer productivity by 30%
- Introduced automated testing practices, achieving 90% code coverage

**Junior Software Engineer** | StartupHub | Aug 2010–Dec 2012

- Contributed to backend API development using Python and Django
- Implemented payment processing integration with Stripe
- Built admin dashboard for customer support team

**Software Engineering Intern** | BigTech Corp | Summer 2009

- Developed internal monitoring dashboard for server fleet
- Automated deployment scripts reducing release time from 4 hours to 30 minutes
